Title: silverstripe/framework vulnerable to user enumeration via timing attack on login and password reset forms
Description: User enumeration is possible by performing a timing attack on the login or password reset pages with user credentials.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 3.5.0-rc1 before 3.5.5, all versions starting from 3.6.0-rc1 before 3.6.2
NotImpacted: All versions before 3.5.0-rc1, all versions starting from 3.5.5 before 3.6.0-rc1, all versions starting from 3.6.2
